title: An arbitrage driven price dynamics of Automated Market Makers in the presence of fees. (arXiv:2401.01526v1 [q-fin.MF])
abstract: We present a model for price dynamics in the Automated Market Makers (AMM) setting. Within this framework, we propose a reference market price following a geometric Brownian motion. The AMM price is constrained by upper and lower bounds, determined by constant multiplications of the reference price. Through the utilization of local times and excursion-theoretic approaches, we derive several analytical results, including its time-changed representation and limiting behavior.

translated_title: 自动市场制造商在费用存在的情况下的套利驱动价格动态
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一种自动市场制造商（AMM）设置下的价格动态模型。在这个框架下，我们提出了一个遵循几何布朗运动的参考市场价格。AMM价格受到上下限的限制，由参考价格的常数乘法确定。通过利用局部时间和游历理论方法，我们得出了几个分析结果，包括其时间变化表示和极限行为。
tldr: 在这篇论文中，我们提出了一个模型来描述自动市场制造商（AMM）设置中的价格动态。通过研究局部时间和游历理论方法，我们得出了几个关键的分析结果，包括其时间变化表示和极限行为。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a model for price dynamics in the Automated Market Makers (AMM) setting, and derives several key analytical results, including its time-changed representation and limiting behavior, through the utilization of local times and excursion-theoretic approaches.
